statements: SELECT * FROM notifications;
SELECT message, timestamp FROM notifications WHERE device_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE id = 5;
SELECT device_id, message FROM notifications ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, device_id, message FROM notifications WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, message, timestamp FROM notifications WHERE device_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE message LIKE '%important%' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, device_id, message FROM notifications WHERE device_id NOT IN (2, 3) ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, message, device_id, timestamp FROM notifications WHERE device_id = 4 OR device_id = 5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE device_id IS NULL ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM notifications;
SELECT notification_id, message, created_at FROM notifications WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT device_id, device_name, location FROM devices WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT message, created_at, notification_id FROM notifications ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT device_name, is_active FROM devices WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT notification_id, message FROM notifications WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' AND device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices WHERE is_active = TRUE ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT message, created_at FROM notifications WHERE device_id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', '456e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000') ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE device_name LIKE '%phone%' OR location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT notification_id, message, created_at FROM notifications WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';

SELECT device_id, device_name FROM devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Mobile';
SELECT alert_id, alert_message, alert_time FROM alerts ORDER BY alert_time ASC;

SELECT * FROM devices WHERE device_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices ORDER BY device_type DESC;
SELECT device_name, alert_message FROM devices JOIN alerts ON devices.device_id = alerts.device_id;

SELECT device_name, device_type, location FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Mobile' ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT alert_type, message FROM alerts WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com' ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT notifications.message, devices.device_name FROM notifications JOIN devices ON notifications.device_id = devices.device_id;
